meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

main.docTitle: Air Pollution Control (Specified Processes) (Specification of Required Particulars and Information) Order 1993

section.name: s1
section.heading: Notice of existing premises used for specified processes
section.content: Notice of the existence of premises used for the conduct of any of the specified processes listed in Schedule 1, containing the particulars and information specified in the form set out in Schedule 2, shall be given in writing by the owner of the premises to the Authority, in the manner specified in that form.

schedule.name: sch2
schedule.heading: Form
schedule.text:
Air Pollution Control Ordinance(Chapter 311)NOTIFICATION OF THE EXISTENCE OF PREMISES USED FOR THE CONDUCT
OF A SPECIFIED PROCESS PURSUANT TO SECTION 19(1)

tr.td: 1. I/We* the undersigned, being the owner/owners* specified in paragraph 2 of the undermentioned premises, hereby give notice that the premises described in paragraph 3 are used for the conduct of the process specified in paragraph 4 and declare that the particulars and information furnished hereunder are correct.
This notification consists of . pages, with associated drawing (. sheets).

tr.td: Please provide schematic diagrams of process flow showing the flow of materials, including raw materials in process of manufacture, manufactured materials, by-products and waste materials. All emission points and processes/equipment, including air pollution control equipment, associated with each emission point, must be identified and labelled with consistent reference numbers.
